amendment.description: To amend the provision relating to funding the Patent and Trademark Office by establishing a United States Patent and Trademark Office Public Enterprise Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 599, as modified, agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 128.

Amendment SA 599 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S5418-5425, S5437-5439; text as modified: CR S5419) To amend the provision relating to funding the Patent and Trademark Office by establishing a United States Patent and Trademark Office Public Enterprise Fund, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 599 proposed by Senator Coburn.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 599, as modified, agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 128.
